title: Two of 'Em in There: A Southern Writer's Journey to and Through the First Year of Twin Motherhood
description: From the moment her doctor informs her “there’s two of ‘em in there” to her twin boys’ first birthday, Finley Bullard Evans’ memoir chronicles the often poignant, frequently hilarious ups and downs of pregnancy and motherhood in the post-feminist South with a wry humor that makes for an engaging and fascinating read. Part mommy memoir, part social commentary, Two of ‘Em in There is the kind of book David Sedaris would write…if he had a uterus.
author: Finley Bullard Evans
